nodes.bodyText: previously we used to return a new copy.  Now we return the same instance back.  Can this cause issues?
It is immutable, so no issues expected.
validateBuildWithDefaults needs to match same validation we do on server sides for activities?
Not necessary as it is for local activity only. But I believe they do now.
I'm confused why no validation here?  I thought this is also all client-side.
This records retry options as they are, to ensure determinism if they change.
